name: Abundant Ebon Deer (Illusion)
description:
An auspicious spiritual beast wrought into being by the Ambrosial Arbor and protects its roots. Its arrival brings along exuberant vegetation and promises good fortune.
Once destroyed during ancient wars, the Ambrosial Arbor is mended by the Stellaron and finally revives. Rare creatures and legendary beasts made by celestials of the past all return to this world, like an old dream coming alive again. This entity is a phantom borne from your memories.

skills.name: Wavering Bleat
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Caress of Wind
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Flamboyant Gore
skills.description: Uses this ability immediately when there are 2 Lavish Fruits on the field. Deals Lightning DMG to all targets. Deals more DMG for every Ambrosial Arbor Branch (Illusion) on the field. After the ability is used, removes all Twigs of Lavish Fruits (Illusion) on the field.

skills.name: Pedicel: Fragrant Verdure
skills.description: Summons Ambrosial Arbor Branches: 2 Twigs of Marple Leaf (Illusion), 1 Twig of Glorious Blooms (Illusion), and 1 Twig of Wintry Wind (Illusion). When Abundant Ebon Deer's Weakness is broken, all the Ambrosial Arbor Branches will be eliminated.

skills.name: Pedicel: Exuberant Shade
skills.description: Summons Ambrosial Arbor Branches: 2 Twigs of Marple Leaf (Illusion), 1 Twig of Lavish Fruits (Illusion), and 1 Twig of Wintry Wind (Illusion). When Abundant Ebon Deer's Weakness is broken, all the Ambrosial Arbor Branches will be eliminated.

skills.name: Glorious Blooms
skills.description: Summons an Ambrosial Arbor Branch: "Twig of Glorious Blooms (Illusion)." Twig of Glorious Blooms (Illusion) prevents friendly units' Toughness from being reduced. This effect is removed when Ambrosial Arbor Branch: Twig of Glorious Blooms (Illusion) is defeated.

skills.name: Vigor Overflow
skills.description: Every time the Abundant Ebon Deer gains a buff from enemy targets, DMG dealt by the Abundant Ebon Deer and all Ambrosial Arbor branches is slightly increased.

skills.name: Seeking Immortality
skills.description: Upon summoning Ambrosial Arbor Branch â€” Twig of Marple Leaf (Illusion), it gains "Cultivation," greatly increasing its Retaliation DMG.

skills.name: Surrounded Protection
skills.description: When there are 4 Ambrosial Arbor branches on the field, the Toughness of the Abundant Ebon Deer cannot be reduced. The effect expires when any Ambrosial Arbor branch is defeated.
